document_data.name: Indolrere Moravan
document_data.mainbody: '''Indolrere Moravan''' was a mage of the [[Zhentarim]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: He was defeated by [[Onlagar Blurnwood]] and his apprentice, [[Talatha Vaerovree]], sometime prior to {{yearlink|1370}}; they chased him out of the house.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Talatha Vaerovree]] had reason to believe he'd spied on her since their last encounter.
